Portal est un bon jeu. Il vous fera réfléchir sur des énigmes de plus en plus complexes qui ne sont pas spécialement compliquées si vous avez bien compris comment fonctionne le jeu, mais celui-ci vous demandera de prendre des décisions de plus en plus rapidement. Le scénario est assez prévisible mais original et l'immersion me semble réussie, surtout vers la fin du jeu. Le jeu est parfois rapide et parfois il vous demandera de prendre votre temps pour réfléchir. J'ai personnellement pris 2 heures pour finir ce jeu, mais ces deux heures furent hautement divertissantes, et le prix de base me semble totalement raisonnable. Si c'est votre première fois dans les jeux de ce style, foncez ! Moi-meme, c'est mon premier jeu du style casse-tete. Si vous etes un habitué, vous devez le connaitre. Je suis plus du style shooters online en fps et MOBAs mais ce jeu m'a néanmoins beaucoup plu, je commencerai le second opus sous peu !

Если всё надоело, и не во что поиграть, Pо́rtal - хорошее решение. Тут интересная механика, это как Garry's Mod или Half Life 1/2, потому-что эти игры созданы на одном движке, но в по́ртале будто впилили порта́лы, потому-что игра, кроме самих-то порта́лов не отличается от своих конкурентов. 
Pоrtal вышла аж в 2007 году, но сюжет тут интересный, хоть его тут немного. Потратил на неё всего лишь 3 часа, и кто вообще не шарит - это ну оооочень мало, в среднем на сюжет в играх тратится около 15-20 часов.
Все, кто любит игры, настоятельно рекомендую пройти Pоrtal, кто ещё не прошёл. 10 порталов из 10...

Believe the hype. Fun puzzler. You'll need lightening reflexes at times but the puzzles manage to be challenging an original each time. Plus, there actually manages to be a storyline and some of the dialogue from the computer is downright hilarious. I won't quote any as that'd be a pretty severe spoiler and I hate those.

The best dollar I have ever spent in my life. If you haven't played this game yet, the value here is insane! Though the experience is quite short, it feels extremely unique even in today's standards. It is simply a blast to play, and it has aged very well. The level design by Valve here is really intricate, and makes for one of the best puzzle games I've ever played.

Jogo realmente muito gostoso de jogar. No começo eu achei meio chato, tanto que demorei pra jogar ele de novo, mas foi só passar umas 3 fases que o negocio foi ficando mais interessante, pra quem gosta de "quebrar a cabeça vai gostar muito do jogo, que infelizmente acaba bem rapidinho, só que apesar disso cada nova fase é um desafio, e você acaba querendo descobrir mais as possibilidades de fazer os portais. Recomendo muito esse joguinho que fez minha alegria por 4 horas, sejam felizes!

Portal is such a great game! The test chambers are challenging and really make you think out of the box. The lines that GLaDOS has are witty and are guaranteed to get a few laughs out of you. I had finished this game before a few years ago and decided to buy it and play it again recently, and, even though I knew what was going to happen, the replay value was tremendous! Would highly recommend!

Portal — настоящий шедевр. Самая смешная, оригинальная, интересная и стабильная игра за последнее время. И, пожалуй, единственная игра, в которой при убийстве финального босса хочется смеяться и плакать одновременно.

this game is amazing, using the portal gun is very fun and the puzzles are well designed and the mechanics and physics of the game and your movement are extremely fun. This game is quite short but its a blast to play and it or portal 2 are one of the best games of all time and probably the best puzzle game ever made. If you have not bought it already you need to especially since the game is only 99 cents at the moment so your paying less then a dollar for one of the best games on the platform.
